name: UpdateTemplateFolder
description:
Update a specific folder for organizing templates.

This tool updates a specific folder used to organize templates in Mailchimp. It should be called when you need to change the details of a template folder, identified by its ID.

parameters.name: template_folder_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the template folder to be updated.

value_schema.description: The unique id for the template folder.

parameters.name: folder_name
parameters.description: The new name for the template folder. Provide a string value.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

parameters.name: folder_id
parameters.description: The unique id for the template folder.

value_schema.description: The unique id for the template folder.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
